_comment: Ship + Captain combo synergies. Hidden from UI until discovered in-game. Effects are small stat nudges (applied as flat bonuses). Keys are 'ship_id+captain_id'.

starchaser+captain_nightmare.name: Precision Strike
starchaser+captain_nightmare.description: Nimble frame lets overdrive target weak points.
starchaser+captain_nightmare.discovered_text: Something clicks between the scout's agile frame and your combat instincts...

starchaser+captain_finswick.name: Evasive Maneuvers
starchaser+captain_finswick.description: Light hull makes the most of defensive reflexes.
starchaser+captain_finswick.discovered_text: The scout weaves naturally around incoming fire under your careful hand...

starchaser+captain_zoltan.name: Scavenger's Eye
starchaser+captain_zoltan.description: A fast ship with a keen eye misses nothing.
starchaser+captain_zoltan.discovered_text: At these speeds, your trained eye catches every glint of salvage...

phantom+captain_nightmare.name: Blitz Protocol
phantom+captain_nightmare.discovered_text: The interceptor's speed turns your attacks into a relentless barrage...

phantom+captain_finswick.name: Crash Barrier
phantom+captain_finswick.description: Reckless speed backed by unbreakable defense.
phantom+captain_finswick.discovered_text: The interceptor's shields flare brighter when flying at full throttle...

phantom+captain_zoltan.name: Hyperscanner
phantom+captain_zoltan.discovered_text: At interceptor speeds, your scanner array covers twice the ground...

dreadnought+captain_nightmare.name: Siege Mode
dreadnought+captain_nightmare.description: A heavy platform makes every shot count.
dreadnought+captain_nightmare.discovered_text: The fortress's massive frame absorbs recoil, letting you fire with devastating precision...

dreadnought+captain_finswick.name: Immovable Object
dreadnought+captain_finswick.description: Maximum armor on maximum hull. Nothing gets through.
dreadnought+captain_finswick.discovered_text: The fortress becomes nearly indestructible under your defensive mastery...

dreadnought+captain_zoltan.name: Command Center
dreadnought+captain_zoltan.description: A floating base of operations with unmatched tactical awareness.
dreadnought+captain_zoltan.discovered_text: With this much room to work, your command center pulls in resources from every direction...

viper+captain_nightmare.name: Gun Run
viper+captain_nightmare.description: A born killer in a cockpit built to kill. Every pass is lethal.
viper+captain_nightmare.discovered_text: The Viper's guns sing under your reckless trigger discipline...

viper+captain_finswick.name: Calculated Risk
viper+captain_finswick.description: Insurance-grade evasion in a frame that was never meant to survive.
viper+captain_finswick.discovered_text: Finswick's risk assessment somehow keeps this fragile ship in one piece...

viper+captain_zoltan.name: Strafing Run
viper+captain_zoltan.description: Fast passes over the battlefield yield maximum salvage.
viper+captain_zoltan.discovered_text: At these speeds, Zoltan's tentacles scoop up every piece of debris in the sector...

prometheus+captain_nightmare.name: Weapons Lab
prometheus+captain_nightmare.description: Science division repurposed for maximum destruction. R&D stands for Ruin & Demolish.
prometheus+captain_nightmare.discovered_text: The Prometheus's labs hum with barely-contained energy as Nightmare reroutes power to weapons...

prometheus+captain_finswick.name: Full Coverage
prometheus+captain_finswick.description: Every system insured, every shield redundant. Finswick finally has a ship worthy of his paperwork.
prometheus+captain_finswick.discovered_text: Finswick files a satisfied smile alongside the Prometheus's third backup shield generator...

prometheus+captain_zoltan.name: Deep Scan
prometheus+captain_zoltan.description: Advanced sensors paired with a resourceful commander. Nothing escapes the net.
prometheus+captain_zoltan.discovered_text: Zoltan's tentacles dance across the Prometheus's sensor arrays, pulling in everything within range...

starchaser+captain_spectra.name: Pattern Recognition
starchaser+captain_spectra.description: SPECTRA's algorithms exploit the scout's agility for optimal firing angles.
starchaser+captain_spectra.discovered_text: SPECTRA sighs: 'Finally, a ship that can keep up with my targeting solutions. Barely.'

phantom+captain_spectra.name: Burst Compiler
phantom+captain_spectra.description: AI-optimized blink timing turns every teleport exit into a kill window.
phantom+captain_spectra.discovered_text: SPECTRA quips: 'Blink in, delete everything, blink out. I've automated your entire personality.'

dreadnought+captain_spectra.name: Turret Logic
dreadnought+captain_spectra.description: SPECTRA repurposes the fortress as a stationary weapons platform. Efficiency over elegance.
dreadnought+captain_spectra.discovered_text: SPECTRA mutters: 'This thing steers like a filing cabinet. Good thing steering is beneath me.'

viper+captain_spectra.name: Predictive Strafing
viper+captain_spectra.description: Machine-perfect lead calculations at dogfight speeds.
viper+captain_spectra.discovered_text: SPECTRA purrs: 'Oh, a ship that actually goes fast. I might enjoy this. Don't ruin it.'

prometheus+captain_spectra.name: Data Fusion
prometheus+captain_spectra.description: SPECTRA integrates with the Prometheus's science arrays. The ship is now an extension of her ego.
prometheus+captain_spectra.discovered_text: SPECTRA announces: 'I've optimized every system on this vessel. You're welcome, organics.'
